programme.title: Hot Pants
programme.desc: King Vincent deliberately avoids having a child with his wife because of his evil plans She falls in love with someone else and this gets to the king.

programme.title: Omugwo
programme.desc: Many years ago, Funke told her best friend Amaka her deepest secret, of the paternity of her son, now their children are married. Who will be responsible for Omugwo?

programme.title: Devils Desire
programme.desc: Eric had a thing with his wifes friend Toki, now she tries to scheme her way into the house through all means possible.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: A marriage proposal is procured and the betrayal of a close friend is afoot. Azubuikes problems intensify.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: The consequences of Adanna and Nnannas love come to rest at their door. Mkpulumma and Ahunna are running out of time, and Onochie steps up in the midst of chaos.

programme.title: Sister Margaret
programme.desc: Sister Margaret is selected by the Ancestors to serve them, while Chima struggles with infertility. Despite his inability to father a child, he seeks healing sister Margaret.

programme.title: The Crash
programme.desc: Scarlets love life changed for good after a plane crash that takes her face, and she has to undergo a plastic surgery. This shocks her husband Nater as he questions her new identity.

programme.title: Love On The Rock
programme.desc: Okenwa will pursue anything under skirt in the guise that he is enjoying his life. He gets two girls pregnant, will this give him a sense of direction?

programme.title: Ghost Bride
programme.desc: Kingsley, a woman beater will face the biggest fear as he kills Mariam while beating her. This incident leads him facing the worst of his life.

programme.title: Major Key
programme.desc: Hector watches while his friends, Tobi and Saint kill Njideka. Now her ghost is back for revenge, but will Hector survive?

programme.title: Mrs. Husband
programme.desc: Blinded by pride, a princess destroys the man she loves, until the gods force her to face the cost of her cruelty.

programme.title: Painful Marriage
programme.desc: Obiora and Uju are passing through hell because Obiora refuse to send his wife away and marry NmaMiri the princess of the sea.

programme.title: Last Chance
programme.desc: Ify the orange seller falls in love with Joe, but his aunt will do anything to make sure that they do not end up together as a couple.

programme.title: Heaven
programme.desc: Chukwuebuka is duped after he did all travel out of the country to play for a football club in Europe, this incident takes the life of his mom but Nurse Uju comes to the rescue.

programme.title: Royal Flip
programme.desc: Obinna and his sister are in love with a prince and a princess, but the battle between Obinna and Dubem, the prince will not let this love work out.

programme.title: She Must Approve
programme.desc: Ken has a daughter Elena, and he will do anything to please. Her duty is to approve any woman her father will marry.

programme.title: Touch Of Grace
programme.desc: Paul and his friend Aboy suffer a great deal in life, until their landlady decides to step in the matter. This turn around gives birth to a stronger relationship for Paul.

programme.title: Beyond Education
programme.desc: Local Dorathy who is in love with John Bosco is about to be involved with what is about to ruin her life, but would have been averted if only she is educated.

programme.title: Bitter Truth
programme.desc: Stanley did the unholy thing with his daughter, after his wife Mira finds out, she will do something terrible to him that will in turn hurt the whole family.

programme.title: Empty Spaces
programme.desc: Ada is in love Nnaemeka and will do anything to have him, now that Ebube has lost her daughter.

programme.title: Pain Of The Fatherless
programme.desc: After Echezona has spent 15 years without a child he gets his maid pregnant. Now he believes as soon as he reunites with his son, all the problems will be over.

programme.title: After 1970
programme.desc: Metu as the wife to a prince is the solution to the quest of the Amankweke royal family, but the wives, Queen Margaret and Scholastica will do everything to make this fail.

programme.title: Bee
programme.desc: Scarlet, an affluent single mother who has sworn off love and marriage, finds herself captivated by her dashing new chauffeur, who also harbors secret affection for her.

programme.title: My Siblings And I
programme.desc: A narrative where we see the happenings through the eyes of each sibling in the family, everyones life is subjective to the opinion of others.

programme.title: Jemeji
programme.desc: Senami regains a powerful memory. Obi sets plans for his escape in motion. Matron and Senami clash.

programme.title: Ring Of Lies
programme.desc: KB refuses to throw the fight, but has he landed himself in more trouble? Pula and Thabelo become caterers for Stukkie and Shandus upcoming wedding.

programme.title: My Flatmates
programme.desc: Obus mounts a banner on the gate to advertise his chambers without Baba Landlords consent.

programme.title: Hustle
programme.desc: The tale of Dayo, a gullible but optimistic young man who moves to Lagos with dreams of making it big

programme.title: Isibaya
programme.desc: Mpiyakhe struggles with his memory. The wives lay down the law with Thandeka. Wiseman has an accident.

programme.desc: A family sitcom that focus on an average family based in Lagos Nigeria, their diverse traits and how they cope with what life has to offer them

programme.title: My Flatmates

programme.title: The Bible Discovery TV Show
programme.desc: Hosted by the Hembree family, the daily show provides tons of theological insight and heartfelt discussion on your daily Bible reading.

programme.title: TPI
programme.desc: An inspirational, energetic and colourful television magazine program, hosted by Muyiwa Olarewaju. It spotlights the voices, insights and lives of Africans and people of African descent globally.

programme.title: Faith Life Church With Keith Moore
programme.desc: Keith Moore is the founder and president of Moore Life Ministries and Faith Life Church, Branson, Missouri and Sarasota, Florida. He places great emphasis on the importance of the written Word and the necessity of being led by the Spirit.

programme.title: No More Curse
programme.desc: The curse of sin met its death at the Cross of Christ. Join Tracy Harris as he unpacks this truth to see miracles of wholeness and destinies restored in the Kingdom.

programme.title: Jesus the Healer with Nancy Dufresne
programme.desc: Jesus mind was tormented on the Cross so we could be free. Nancy Dufresne teaches how to keep our thoughts under control for a sound mind.

programme.title: Faith Today
programme.desc: Join Dr Andre and Jenny as they share exciting news and interview guests from all around the world.

programme.title: Building People
programme.desc: Bishop EJ Moodley II pastors Bethsaida Ministries International, a dynamic multicultural church based in Phoenix Durban. Their focus is on spiritually equipping the body of Christ.

programme.title: Faith Hill Church
programme.desc: Join Tafara and Chipo Butayi in their assignment to empower the body of Christ to live in the fullness of salvation. Through their shepherding, learn to receive the fullness of your salvation and walk in love, wellness and prosperity.

programme.title: Winning Walk
programme.desc: Winning Walk is the broadcast of Dr Ed Young and takes its title from his first book, The Winning Walk, Outfitting For The Christian Adventure.

programme.title: Hope Alive
programme.desc: We are living in a broken and hurting world. Are you in desperate need of the restoring hand of God? Hope Restoration Ministries presents you with messages of hope and restoration. Keep your hope alive.

programme.title: Changing Your World
programme.desc: Dr Creflo Dollar, founder and president of the Creflo Dollar Ministries, shares the wisdom and inspiring message of the Gospel of Jesus Christ in a unique manner.

programme.title: Faith with Dr. Juanita Bynum
programme.desc: An empowering 30-minute encounter that is produced to restore, enrich and increase faith, emotional intelligence and spiritual foundation of believers worldwide.

programme.title: Advancing the Church Globally
programme.desc: Dr Hendrik Vorster and his team advance the global Church through prayer, values training, church planting, discipleship, and activating Gods call in peoples lives.

programme.title: Believers Voice Of Victory
programme.desc: Kenneth and Gloria Copeland teach about faith, love, healing, prosperity, redemption, righteousness, the anointing and principles of victorious Christian living through the uncompromised Word of God.

programme.title: New Level
programme.desc: Pastors Hank and Brenda Kunnemans New Level series is a power-packed program that delivers relevant and balanced messages to equip you to walk boldly in the power of the Holy Spirit!

programme.title: Whats The Word
programme.desc: Bryan Wright delivers a fresh, practical word of faith, empowering you to live victoriously and navigate todays challenges with confidence and hope.

programme.title: Miracles Now with Brian Bolt
programme.desc: Raise up a global army of fire-baptized remnant believers who will preach the Gospel around the world and see nations transformed by the power of the Holy Ghost through international crusades.

programme.title: Bearded Bible Brothers
programme.desc: Joshua and Caleb Colson travel around the world to share teachings from the Bible that emphasize Israel, prophecy and the Jewish roots of Christianity.

programme.title: The Gospel Truth
programme.desc: Teaching the truth of the Gospel to the body of Christ with special emphasis on Gods unconditional love and the balance between grace and faith.

programme.title: No More Curse
programme.desc: The curse of sin met its death at the Cross of Christ. Join Tracy Harris as he unpacks this truth to see miracles of wholeness and destinies restored in the Kingdom.

programme.desc: Mei leads the Thunderbolt Womens Commando Unit to defeat the drug cartel in a fierce battle, and successfully rescue her undercover father who has his identity exposed.

programme.title: The Iron Fisted Monk
programme.desc: After learning kung fu from Shaolin, Husker teams up with the Iron Fisted Monk to fight against the Manchus who have killed villagers and raped women.

programme.title: Dragon Squad
programme.desc: A veteran cop leads a team of Interpol agents to track down ruthless mercenaries who kidnapped an accused crime lord on his way to court.

programme.title: The Last Blood
programme.desc: The Dalai Lama and Bees girlfriend are injured by the Red Army. Bee must find the only 3 donors with rare blood type P in 12 hours and fight against the terrorists to save them.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When Sergeant Lo loses his police revolver to four young triad thugs, he enlists the help of PTU Sergeant Ho and his patrol team to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Guns and Roses
programme.desc: Jin Shui risks all to save his family, fleeing France with the help of his friend. Amid challenges, Jin Shui faces a dilemma: love or loyalty to his friend.

programme.title: Undercover Punch And Gun
programme.desc: An undercover police officer teams up with unlikely allies in order to fight a powerful drug dealer and take down a drug smuggling ring.

programme.title: Return Of The Lucky Stars
programme.desc: Four orphaned buddies open a detective agency and before they know it, they are coerced into taking on some vicious gangsters...

programme.title: Bangkok Storm
programme.desc: An underground boxer loses his memory while escaping from the Bangkok triad. When he regains his memory after starting anew, he vows to take down the triad.

programme.title: The Fortune Code
programme.desc: Set in World War II, a secret agent is tasked with the mission to rescue Mammon, who knows the code to a $500 billion fund for the Chinese army.

programme.title: The New Option
programme.desc: An elite cop fulfils his dream to join the Special Duty Unit, facing rigorous training and the challenge of stopping a daring heist by a gang of dangerous criminals.

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: Two brothers, one a drug lord and the other a police officer, clash in an endless battle between good and evil in a drug cartels turf war.

programme.title: Executioners
programme.desc: An evil deformed villain controls Hong Kongs scarce water supply, so the trio of Wonder Woman, Thief Catcher and Invisible Woman must team up and save the city.

programme.title: The Inspector Wears Skirts
programme.desc: In this slapstick comedy, an all-female police squad encounters sexism and conflicts during training, but must band together to take down a group of terrorists.

programme.title: Young Heroes Of Chaotic Times
programme.desc: Set in Shanghai in the late Qing Dynasty, a young man Chen Zhen, rises to become a national hero after enduring hardships and overcoming challenges in life.

programme.title: Lady Reporter
programme.desc: FBI agent Cindy is sent to Hong Kong as an undercover reporter to expose a money forging ring run by a devious newspaper editor, using the newspapers presses.

programme.title: Clean My Name, Mr Coroner
programme.desc: An undercover cop framed for murder is forced to take a coroner hostage so as to prove his innocence in the murder of his partner.

programme.title: Tiger Cage III
programme.desc: Two cops investigate the shady dealings of a rich businessman but are set up and assaulted. As they uncover the mastermind behind, the final showdown becomes inevitable.

programme.title: 3AM The Campus
programme.desc: A school girl joins a horror video project filmed in an old building near her campus to take revenge on a bullying gang, even at the expense of sacrificing the innocents...

programme.title: The Inspector Wear Skirt II
programme.desc: In this sequel, the female police squad members struggle to blend in with the new recruits, and must also join the Special Duty Unit to capture an escaped prisoner.

programme.title: Mr Vampire II
programme.desc: Grave robbing archeologists discover vampires immobilized by paper spells. While transporting them, the vampires revive and escape. A local herbalist sets out to destroy them.

programme.title: Skinny Tiger and Fatty Dragon
programme.desc: Detective Baldy and his partner Fatty stumble upon the robbery of a jewelry store, which puts them on the trail of a triad crime syndicate.

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: Yu Xiang and her daughter move into a new neighbourhood where everyones life seems perfect. However, dark secrets and horror have raided each family from the inside.

programme.title: Iceman The Time Traveler
programme.desc: In this sequel, the four imperial guards are defrosted and reanimated in modern times. With different motives in mind, they strive to find their way back in time...

programme.title: The Postman Fights Back
programme.desc: When postman Ma and three other mismatched allies deliver a secret cargo to the rebel leader, Ma finds himself on a patriotic quest to save the country and himself.

programme.title: The Sniper
programme.desc: A police sniper teams up with a hot-headed rookie to take down his former friend and teammate who is exacting revenge on the police.

programme.title: Legacy Of Rage
programme.desc: Brandon Lee, the son of Bruce Lee, stars as Brandon Ma - a man seeking revenge on his friend, Michael, who frames him for his own crime and steals the love of his life.

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: The film pays tribute to generations of stuntmen, including current super stars, who designed and delivered some of the most spectacular death-defying kung fu moves on-screen.

programme.title: Eclats De Vie
programme.desc: Lidylle entre une jeune artiste et lheritier dune famille fortunee, qui doit lutter pour imposer ses choix face son entourage, fait resurgir de lourds secrets.

programme.title: Passions Troubles
programme.desc: A la mort mysterieuse dun homme daffaires puissant, lepouse de lun de ses employes, son amie de frache date et son amant sont suspectes.

programme.desc: Ofelia Garca reve de sortir de la misre et voit dans la beaute de sa fille Mar un billet pour la celebrite.

programme.title: Parineetii

programme.title: Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior
programme.desc: Almost unimaginable after the mega success of Mad Max, the sequel came in bigger, better, and bolder, securing Mel Gibson a place in the post-apocalyptic action genre forever.

programme.title: Killing Field
programme.desc: Chad Michael Murray and Bruce Willis star in this action thriller. A grieving battle veterans life is disrupted when a cop and a drug cartel arrive on his property.

programme.title: Blinding Lights
programme.desc: A young aspiring female singer struggling with addiction wants to make it big in the Atlanta music scene. She decides to overcome the strikes she has against her family.

programme.title: The Ex Obsession
programme.desc: An accidental death leads to stolen identity when a woman coerces her husband to assume her dead exs identity. Their desperate cover-up spirals into obsession.

programme.title: The First Noelle
programme.desc: An ambitious young book editor named Noelle attempts to win back her ex after he returns home for Christmas with a new girlfriend, who also happens to be named Noelle.

programme.title: The Curious Case Of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: An Oscar-winning romantic drama based on a F. Scott Fitzgerald story. Brad Pitt stars as a man born already in his eighties who must live his life ageing in reverse.

programme.title: The Holiday Dating Guide
programme.desc: A delightful holiday romcom. To satisfy her publisher, a dating coach must prove her advice works by making a man fall for her by Christmas Eve in 12 days.

programme.title: The Perfect Score
programme.desc: A crime-filled comedy about six students who decide to break into their school to steal the answers to an upcoming exam. With luck on their side, they all score high grades.

programme.title: The Barkers: Mind The Cats!
programme.desc: An adventure-filled animation. While on holiday with his dog family, Kid is eager to play with his siblings, but they are too busy. Luckily, Kid finds new friends: Cats.

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: This adorable animation with an ensemble cast explores the world inside our phones, where emojis live and one multi-expressional emoji heads off on an adventure to discover his purpose.

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: Will Smith fights for survival in this gripping post-apocalyptic film. When a plague kills most of mankind and changes the rest into monsters, a man fights to find a cure.

programme.title: Fortress 2: Snipers Eye
programme.desc: The sequel to the action cyber thriller Fortress. Weeks after the deadly assault on Fortress Camp, Robert (Bruce Willis) makes a daring rescue to save the widow of his old nemesis.

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Oscar winner Matt Damon reprises his role as the CIAs most dangerous former operative. Hes on a mission to uncover more truths about his past in this explosive action-thriller.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Not many films rival the visual spectacle of Christopher Nolans sci-fi epic. Leonardo DiCaprio and a stellar cast enter peoples dreams to steal corporate secrets.

programme.title: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
programme.desc: The third Mad Max film sees an exiled Mel Gibson and a tribe of kids battle Tina Turner in a swirl of stunning stunts, gladiatorial fighting, and general post-nuclear mayhem.

programme.title: The Last Job
programme.desc: Oscar winner Richard Dreyfuss seeks revenge on those who wronged him in this thriller. After his savings are stolen, a former mob boss returns to his old ways to find the thieves.

programme.title: Deadly DILF
programme.desc: A compelling thriller. A harmless flirtation between a college girl and the hot dad next door turns deadly when she becomes obsessed with him and tries to destroy his marriage.

programme.title: Twisted Vines
programme.desc: A murder mystery that will keep you guessing. A wedding at a vineyard estate turns deadly when a body is discovered, and all the guests turn into suspects.

programme.title: Our Almost Completely True Story
programme.desc: A sincere and hilarious love story. A short Jewish man pursues a tall, ageing Hollywood star.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: This historical drama ties the loose ends of an award-winning show of the same name. It shows the lives of a family and its servants as they navigate through changes in society.

programme.title: Arthur
programme.desc: Russell Brand drives this remake of an 80s classic. A rich playboy must choose between a marriage that will ensure his lavish lifestyle or a financially uncertain future with his true love.

programme.title: Abominable
programme.desc: An exciting animated adventure. An encounter with a Yeti, targeted by a rich man, sets teenage Yi and her two friends on an adventure to return the magical creature to his home.

programme.title: Nanny Mcphee And The Big Bang
programme.desc: Oscar winner Emma Thompson writes and stars in this fun family film. A mysterious nanny arrives to help a struggling mom with her kids and the farm while their father is at war.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: Iconic martial arts actor Jackie Chan drives this action-adventure film. A highly trained security company is hired to protect an accountant after a mercenary group targets him.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: An ensemble cast brings the legendary comic book league to life in this superhero movie. When Earth is attacked by an alien force, Batman recruits the help of the planets mightiest heroes.

programme.title: The Ice Road
programme.desc: Liam Neeson leads this riveting film about a diamond mine that collapses in Canada. A big-rig road driver leads a rescue mission over a frozen lake to save some trapped miners.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Director Michael Mann (Heat) teams up with Golden Globe winner Colin Farrell and Oscar winner Jamie Foxx to reboot the 80s classic crime show about Miamis top vice detectives.

programme.title: The Boy
programme.desc: An intimate portrait of a 9-year-old sociopaths growing fascination with death.

programme.title: Conspiracy Theory
programme.desc: An engrossing thriller starring Mel Gibson. A conspiracy theory-obsessed New York cab driver becomes a target for the CIA when one of his theories happens to be true.

programme.title: Dead Trigger: Unkilled
programme.desc: A post-apocalyptic film that sees an elite soldier unit stepping in to save humanity when a virus decimates the world and creates zombie hordes.

programme.title: Gangster Squad
programme.desc: Brooklyn-born mob king Mickey Cohen runs the show in this town, reaping the ill-gotten gains from the drugs, the guns, the prostitutes.

programme.title: Two For The Money
programme.desc: A college quarterback whose professional league future is cut short by a knee injury is mentored in sports book gambling by a manic salesman.

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: They say that opposites attract, at least for one intoxicated evening, but several pregnancy tests later, Ben and Alison are lead on a funny and heart-warming journey in parenthood.

programme.title: I Now Pronounce You Chuck and Larry
programme.desc: Chuck and Larry are best friends and fellow firefighters, two straight tough-guys who must stumble through an outrageous charade a love-struck newlyweds!

programme.title: Hidden Figures
programme.desc: An incredible and inspiring untold true story about three women at NASA who were instrumental in one of historys greatest operations - the launch of astronaut John Glenn into orbit.

programme.title: Temptation: Confessions Of A...
programme.sub-title: Temptation: Confessions Of A Marriage Counselor
programme.desc: A married woman whose temptation by a billionaire leads to betrayal, recklessness and forever alters the course of her life.

programme.title: Coach Carter
programme.desc: Controversy surrounds high school basketball coach Ken Carter after he benches his entire team for breaking their academic contract with him.

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: Ben Whittaker, a 70-year-old widower, has discovered that retirement isnt all its cracked up to be. Seizing an opportunity to get back in the game, he becomes a senior intern.

programme.title: You Dont Mess With The Zohan
programme.desc: A Mossad agent fakes his death so he can re-emerge in New York City as a hair stylist.

programme.title: Meet Dave
programme.desc: Seeking a way to save their doomed world, a crew of tiny, human-looking aliens arrives on Earth in the perfect disguise a spaceship shaped like an ordinary man.

programme.title: Hitch
programme.desc: Alex Hitch Hitchens is a legendary, and deliberately anonymous, New York City date doctor who, for a fee, has helped countless men woo the women of their dreams.

programme.title: Little Man: Isela Elimfishane
programme.desc: A crime boss has offered recently paroled 3-foot-tall jewel thief Calvin Sims and partner Percy $100,000 to steal a famous diamond.

programme.title: The 40 Year Old Virgin
programme.desc: Steve Carell plays a nice guy who has lived his whole life without doing it, but now his misguided pals are helping him to score and maybe even find true love.

programme.desc: An assassin has a single day to find redemption after he is given a second chance at life.

programme.title: Summoned
programme.desc: When members of a jury begin dying according to their seat numbers, a juror races to find out whats behind the unexplained deaths.

programme.title: Primal

programme.title: The War With Grandpa
programme.desc: A boy is livid when his grandfather is given his room, but his attempts to get the space back lead to an escalating conflict between the generations.

programme.desc: On the strange island where a mad scientist lives, the Cortez kids find that their gadgets fail them as they face rival child spies.

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: When the worlds greatest secret agents are kidnapped, the only people who can save them are their children.

programme.title: Fast Five

programme.title: Furious 7

programme.desc: The sole witness to a brutal murder is protected from retribution by a Chinese bodyguard, but his position is compromised when they fall in love.

programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: Two hardened criminals get into trouble with the US border patrol after meeting with a Mexican drug lord, and soon revelations start to unfold.

programme.title: Marauders
programme.desc: FBI agents investigating a series of well-planned bank heists are led to suspect that there is more going on than a simple string of armed robberies.

programme.title: Halo 4: Forward Unto Dawn
programme.desc: A United Nations Space Command cadet suffers a crisis of conscience as he prepares to battle the fanatical alien Covenant for the future of mankind.

programme.title: Wonder Park
programme.desc: A young girl manages to will the amusement park of her dreams into a reality, only to find it is under threat. Can she and her animal pals save it?

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: The grumpy green-skinned ogre faces a fight for his life after he is tricked into allowing himself to be erased from existence.

programme.title: Storks
programme.desc: Storks have moved on from delivering babies to parcels, but when an order for a baby appears, they must scramble to fix the error.

programme.title: The Fast And The Furious: Tokyo Drift

programme.desc: Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries.

programme.title: Furious 7
programme.desc: Dominic and his family face trouble when Shaws brother seeks bloody revenge.

programme.title: Exit Wounds

programme.title: The Legend
